content: Hey Emily! Good to finally meet you. How's it going since we talked?
Hey Amy! Nice to see you. I got new running shoes, they're so comfy! What's up with you? Anything new?
Cool shoes! Where'd you get them? I've been busy with work and hikes. I did a tough one last Fri that was awesome! You hike too?
Thanks a ton, Amy! Picked up em up last week at the sports store. Hiking sounds awesome! Haven't done that much, but love trying new trails. Got any recs for newbies?
Yeah, Old Man's Cave in Hocking Hills is awesome! It's pretty easy so it's great for beginners. Have you explored any state parks in Ohio?
Wow, that looks gorgeous! Never been to any Ohio state parks yet but I'd love to explore nature more. Is there a special time of year to see Old Man's Cave?

It's so pretty all year, but it's amazing in fall when the leaves change colors. The extra colorful foliage makes it so special! If you can, try to visit then. Is there anything outdoors you've been wanting to try?
Oh I see, I'll have to visit in the fall! I'm not sure what activity I would do, got any recommendations?
Yeah, I do- Try paddleboarding! It's so much fun. I did it with friends last summer and it was awesome. Any local lakes or beaches you can go paddleboarding at?
That looks like fun! Where did you go? There're some good local lakes and beaches near me, I gotta give it a go!
It was at Alum Creek Lake! I drove up in the Prius singing tunes the whole way. Enjoy it and let me know how it goes!

Absolutely! Thanks, Amy. Chatting with you was great. Bye! Hey Amy! Long time no see! I went paddleboarding last weekend. It was awesome! How's everything going? Got any cool adventures or trails to recommend?
Hi Emily! Awesome, glad you went. Been doing some exploring lately - drove my Prius to the mountains and it was beautiful! You got any outdoor plans coming up?

Thanks, Amy! Your pic looks awesome, what a cool backdrop. I'm doing great. Since we chatted, I've been checking out more trails. I ran 5 miles at the park too. Recently I went on a tough hike that was awesome. Got any you'd recommend?

Thanks Emily! That hike sounds awesome! Old Man's Cave in Hocking Hills is one of my faves, like I told ya before. The Gorge Trail is only 2 miles, and there're some epic waterfalls. You should try it! Any Disney half marathons in your future plans?
Thanks for the reminder, Amy! I'll add it to my list. Yeah, I can't wait to run a Disney half one day, have you done any Disney races? Got any tips?

Yeah, Emily! I've done a few in Florida. Such a fun and really extra special experience. Arrive early on race day to get the vibe, and don't forget to take lots of snaps with your fav characters. It'll add so much to the fun. Lemme know if you need more advice.
That's awesome, Amy! I'm excited. Got it, arrive early and document the fun. Thanks, I'll hit you up if I have any more queries. Appreciate it!
No worries Em! Glad to help. Give me a shout if you need more advice or recs for your outdoor adventures. Enjoy!
Thanks, Amy! Much appreciated. Have fun exploring!
Thanks, Emily! Always good to chat about our shared love for outdoor adventures. Bought anything new lately?
Yeah! I grabbed a new water bottle and some colorful socks for my runs. Have you bought anything lately?
That's awesome! You'll get a new personal best soon with those! And not really, I just recommended some new flowers for my mom to buy.
For sure! I did just outrun my last PB with 8 miles yesterday!
Wow, that's amazing Emily! You're doing great, and I know you'll keep on improving!
Take care, Amy! Enjoy every moment of your next adventure. Chat soon!
Thanks, Emily! Looking forward to my next adventure. See ya!
See ya soon, Amy! Have fun on your next trip!
Thanks, Emily. Can't wait for it - chat soon!
Later, Amy! Stay safe and have a great time!
Thanks, Emily! I'll let you know how it goes. Gonna talk to my friend about some night hiking gear she recommended. Catch ya later!
Hey Amy! Long time no talk – how've you been? Been on any cool outdoor trips lately? Any recs?
Hey Emily! Good to hear from you :) Been doin' alright. Just got some headlamps and went night hiking. Any new trails you've checked out lately?

Heya Amy! Climbing volcanoes, wow, sounds cool! I just went exploring last month and checked out some of my fav spots. Saw some cool hidden gems and took heaps of pics. Check this out - this one's from a park I visited.
That's a great picture! Where did you get it? By the way, I've been wanting to check out more of Ohio's state parks. Got any tips?
I took it near the Golden Gate - one of my fav spots in the city. Have you been to the Hocking Hills yet? So amazing - go check out Old Man's Cave! It's worth it.
Woah, Golden Gate looks great! Gotta add it to my list. I told you 'bout Old Man's Cave when we talked, did you go?
Sorry 'bout the repeat. Yeah, Old Man's Cave was gorgeous. The foliage was awesome and I really enjoyed all the trails. Thanks for the tip!
No need to apologize! Glad you had a blast there, it's so special! Got any other hiking spots on your list?
Yeah, I've got a few hikes I wanna do. Cuyahoga Valley NP and Mohican SP sound great! Heard good things about em. Fancy checking out the scenery there soon? Been to any of 'em?

Yep, I've been to both last year actually. They're both awesome and have different kinds of trails and scenery. You'll have a blast exploring them - let me know if you need any advice about the parks!
Thanks, Amy! I'll hit you up if I need advice. Can't wait to check out these parks.
Awesome, Emily! Gonna go read about volcanoes now, lol. Can't wait to finally climb one!
Thanks, Amy! I'm gonna have a great time exploring. Stay safe!
Thanks, Emily! I'll stay safe. Have fun exploring!
Thanks, Amy! I'm gonna have a blast exploring. I'm gonna go read up about car accessories. See ya soon!
See ya, Emily! Have fun. Can't wait to hear all about it!
Hey Amy! Long time no talk. I hope you're doing great. Guess what? I just did a 5K, and it was awesome! What have you been getting up to? Anything new?

Hey Emily! Congrats on the 5K - so cool! I did a half marathon at Disney last week and it was amazing. I wore my lucky red scarf, take a look. Have you been there before? Any more races coming up for you?
Hey, Amy! Congrats on the half marathon. That scarf's awesome - did you make it? Disney's been on my bucket list for ages. I'm running another 5K next month, super excited. Got anything planned?
